page.title: 12Home Life.Scremerston.
page.content: A day in the life of{Angela}aged 9. I get up at a quarter to 7 and only have a cup of tea for breakfast.I get washed and dressed ready for school.I} travel on the mini-bus and we arrive at{school}at half past 8.School starts at 8.40 with a half hour assembly in the Hall.We then go to our classes for Maths and English up to our playtime at 10.30.At break we have a bottle of milk and crisps or fruit, and we then play games in the yard or on the field if it is fine weather. After break we have a music lesson and some social studies work. At twelve o'clock we have{dinner, sometimes it is sausage,chips and peas followed by ice-cream.After dinner we have Art & Craft and then read to the teacher.We go home at 2.45 and sometimes I watch television as I have my tea.I go to{bed}at 8 o'clock.
